subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chase Utley drove in three runs, Shane Victorino had three hits and Philadelphia defeated the host Atlanta Braves, 6-4, yesterday to give the Phillies a winning record for the first time this season.
snippet: Chase Utley drove in three runs, Shane Victorino had three hits and Philadelphia defeated the host Atlanta Braves, 6-4, yesterday to give the Phillies a winning record for the first time this season.
